title: Manage Airplane Flight Manual (AFM) Revisions
description: After a change in aircraft performance or limitations, a technical writer must revise the official AFM and submit it for regulatory approval.

tasks.description: Receive the engineering data detailing the change in performance or limitation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the new data that necessitates an AFM change.

tasks.description: Revise the affected sections of the AFM to incorporate the new information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately updates the AFM content.

tasks.description: Submit the revised AFM to the regulatory agency (e.g., FAA) for approval and, once approved, distribute it to all operators.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent manages the approval and distribution process correctly.
